review: Works like its supposed to..Portable design and comfortable to use. Its suitable for a quick shave with little to minimal stubble. However if you want 100% clean shave better to go for double bladed shaver types than round headed. Round head are good only for quick shave, however it will take a bit time using the same to get clean smooth shave due to the shape of the head.Flat heads take time and may not be quick, but give 100% clean and smooth shave.The shaver heads move to adjust to con...
